Revised Cigarette Specifications _

summary: The American Solace Company is the world's largest manufacturer of cigarettes. The company is based in Reidsville, New Jersey. It was founded in 1881 and went public in 1983. In 1984, it was acquired by British American Tobacco, which went bankrupt in 1998.
